title: Drawing, "Birth of Bacchus; Banquet of Bacchus and Ariadne", early 19th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and wash over graphite on wove paper. Borders ruled in ink.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink in upper center, at top margin: nascita di Bacco; in center: convito di Bacco a Arianna
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mrs. and Mrs. Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Birth of Bacchus; Banquet of Bacchus and Ariadne", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Pen and brown ink, brush and wash over graphite on wove paper. Borders ruled in ink.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3080.
